SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_FOODBANKTX_COUNT
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the total transactions for a food bank based on transaction type.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Technical Training
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_FOODBANKTX_COUNT(@FOODBANKID uniqueidentifier, @FOODBANKTXTYPECODE tinyint) returns integer with execute as caller as begin return ( select count(ID) from dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER where FOODBANKID = @FOODBANKID and FOODBANKTXTYPECODE = @FOODBANKTXTYPECODE ) end
